mapper.select: SELECT (A.TRAN_AMOUNT * 0.02) as HANAPOINT, (B.NAME) AS NAME, (B.PHONENUMBER) AS PHONENUMBER FROM FINAL_TRANSACTION_HISTORY A, FINAL_MEMBER B WHERE A.WITHDRAWAL_PHONE_NUMBER = '${phonenumber}' AND B.VIDEO = 'Y'

SELECT (A.TRAN_AMOUNT * 0.01) as HANAPOINT, (B.NAME) AS NAME, (B.PHONENUMBER) AS PHONENUMBER FROM FINAL_TRANSACTION_HISTORY A, FINAL_MEMBER B WHERE A.WITHDRAWAL_PHONE_NUMBER = '${phonenumber}' AND B.IMAGE = 'Y'

SELECT (A.TRAN_AMOUNT * 0.03) as HANAPOINT, (B.NAME) AS NAME, (B.PHONENUMBER) AS PHONENUMBER FROM FINAL_TRANSACTION_HISTORY A, FINAL_MEMBER B WHERE A.WITHDRAWAL_PHONE_NUMBER = '${phonenumber}' AND B.NEWACCOUNT = 'Y'
mapper.update: update FINAL_ACCOUNT set OPEN_BANKING = '동의' where PHONE_NUMBER = '${phonenumber}'
mapper.insert: insert into FINAL_MEMBER(no, name, id, password, phonenumber, sex) values(seqmember.nextval, #{name}, #{id}, #{password}, #{phonenumber}, #{sex})
mapper.update: update final_member set openbanking = '동의' where phonenumber = '${phoneNumber}'
update final_member set type = '신랑' where phonenumber = '${phoneNumber}'
update final_member set type = '신부' where phonenumber = '${phoneNumber}'
update GUEST_GROUP set MEMBER_TYPE = (#{memberType}) where MEMBER_PHONENUMBER =(#{memberPhoneNumber})
mapper.insert: insert into GUEST_GROUP(MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PHONENUMBER, FIRST_GUEST_GROUP, SECOND_GUEST_GROUP, THIRD_GUEST_GROUP, FOURTH_GUEST_GROUP) values(#{memberName}, #{memberId}, #{memberPhoneNumber}, #{firstGuestGroup}, #{secondGuestGroup}, #{thirdGuestGroup}, #{fourthGuestGroup} )
mapper.select: select WITHDRAWAL_NAME, TRAN_AMOUNT from FINAL_TRANSACTION_HISTORY where guest_group = '${groupName}'
SELECT GUEST_GROUP, COUNT(WITHDRAWAL_NAME) AS COUNT FROM FINAL_TRANSACTION_HISTORY GROUP BY GUEST_GROUP
SELECT GUEST_GROUP, SUM(TRAN_AMOUNT) AS COUNT FROM FINAL_TRANSACTION_HISTORY GROUP BY GUEST_GROUP
mapper.update: update FINAL_MEMBER set VIDEO = 'Y' where phonenumber = '${phoneNumber}'
update FINAL_MEMBER set IMAGE = 'Y' where phonenumber = '${phoneNumber}'
mapper.select:
select TRAN_NUM, SUBSTR(WITHDRAWAL_NAME, 0,1)||'*'||SUBSTR(WITHDRAWAL_NAME, 3,1) as WITHDRAWAL_NAME,
decode(WITHDRAWAL_BANK_CODE, '2', '하나은행', decode(WITHDRAWAL_BANK_CODE, '9', '국민은행', decode(WITHDRAWAL_BANK_CODE, '14', '신한은행' , decode(WITHDRAWAL_BANK_CODE, '20', '우리은행')))) as WITHDRAWAL_BANK_CODE,
SUBSTR(WITHDRAWAL_PHONE_NUMBER, 0,3)||'-****-'||SUBSTR(WITHDRAWAL_PHONE_NUMBER, 8) as WITHDRAWAL_PHONE_NUMBER,
TRAN_AMOUNT,
TRAN_DATE
from FINAL_TRANSACTION_HISTORY where WITHDRAWAL_BANK_CODE != '2'
mapper.update: update FINAL_MEMBER set NEWACCOUNT = 'Y' where phonenumber = '${phoneNumber}'
update FINAL_ACCOUNT set NEW_ACCOUNT = 'Y' where PHONE_NUMBER = '${phoneNumber}'
